name: Atelier Marnie: Reverie (itch)
description:
An adventure long forgotten.
Atelier Marnie: Reverie is one thing: A sort of
demo to a game that will never be released. A forgotten dream of a game
that will never be.
I worked so long on this game; changing it,
adding to it, and even revamping the entire thing 3 times. I could never
get everything I wanted out of it... out of it. I was too ambitious.
So please, take my concept and enjoy what is left of it.
Credits
Sprites and Face plates by Kaduki
http://usui.moo.jp/rpg_tukuru.html
Music by CaMeLiA
http://agnello-pecora.chu.jp/CAMeLIA/
Script Credits are In Game.
Thank you David for listening to me overdevelop the game for years... I don't know how you deal with me haha.
